text: Aru koise, â€œManu khan, tumikhan kele eneka kori ase? Amikhan bhi apuni khan nisena bhabona thaka manu he ase. Amikhan apuni khan ke Isor laga kotha prochar kori bole ahise, etu kotha huni kene Isor pora itcha nakora kaam khan chari bole, sorgo, prithibi aru samundar te jiman jinis ase sob Tai pora he bonaise.
